item.description:
Unfortunately Fenway Bark can't sponsor the space on Thanksgiving weekend because of the shear volume of guests they have at the "hotel" over the holidays. I was out of of town and did not get their note telling me and apologizing for not notifying us earlier, so I apologize for the late change in venue. I am canceling the Fenway Bark meetup and moving it to Peter's Park, so get ready for a SUNDAY meetup at Peter's Park!

Meetup dues are $3 per Frenchie... I am planning to be there to collect so please bring a few bucks to help cover the costs for the next 6 months of meetup fees.

Your Frenchie's canine brothers, sisters and friends are more than welcome to join us at the park! Please abide by the weight/size limits posted at the entrance to the small and larger dog entrances.

Get your meetup on and come join the fun, there is plenty of metered parking right on Washington St next to the park!

Sorry to keep changing up the Fenway Bark meetups, we will make sure to have some more great meetups there over the winter!

Thanks so much, Zeek!

group.name: The Boston French Bulldog Meetup Group

item.name: **Change Of Date & Venue** November French Bulldog Meetup - part deux!
